thread.section_title: Low Cost Funeral Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of low-cost-funeral.co.uk
thread.title: JUNE WHITE
thread.title_full: Low Cost Funeral reviewed by JUNE WHITE

author: JUNE WHITE
title: JUNE WHITE
text: It did not feel 'low cost' as everything was virtually the same as the usual undertakers...we had choices....just wish the name could be changed to something like 'simple dignity' sounds like you are being a cheapskate for your loved ones...but that aside....brilliant...just wish it was advertised more as I am sure more people would choose this option...we only found out after arranging a very expensive funeral and the details were in a pack given to us after, but so glad we did.
